name: Copper Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot-long  5-foot wide-line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw  taking 13 (3d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales toxic gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw  becoming slowed for 1 minute on a failure. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Flow Within the Mountain
special_abilities.desc: The dragon has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in mountainous regions.
